00041 class F3_MailformPlusPlus_Validator_Default extends F3_MailformPlusPlus_AbstractValidator {
00042         
00052         public function validate($gp,$settings,&$errors) {
00053                 
00054                 //set GET/POST parameters
00055                 $this->gp = $gp;
00056 
00057                 //no config? validation returns true
00058                 if(!is_array($settings['fieldConf.'])) {
00059                         return true;
00060                 }
00061                 
00062                 //$disableErrorCheckFields = array();
00063                 if(isset($settings['disableErrorCheckFields'])) {
00064                         $disableErrorCheckFields = t3lib_div::trimExplode(",",$settings['disableErrorCheckFields']);
00065                 }
00066                 if(is_array($settings['requiredFields'])) {
00067                         foreach($settings['requiredFields'] as $field) {
00068                                 $settings['fieldConf.'][$field."."]['errorCheck.'] = array();
00069                                 $settings['fieldConf.'][$field."."]['errorCheck.']['1'] = "required";
00070                         }
00071                 }
00072                                 
00073                 //foreach configured form field
00074                 foreach($settings['fieldConf.'] as $fieldName=>$fieldSettings) {
00075                         $name = str_replace(".","",$fieldName);
00076                         
00077                         //parse error checks
00078                         if(is_array($fieldSettings['errorCheck.'])) {
00079                                 $counter = 0;
00080                                 $errorChecks = array();
00081                                 //set required to first position if set
00082                                 foreach($fieldSettings['errorCheck.'] as $key=>$check) {
00083                                         if(!strstr($key,".")) {
00084                                                 if(!strcmp($check,"required") || !strcmp($check,"file_required")) {
00085                                                         $errorChecks[$counter]['check'] = $check;
00086                                                         unset($fieldSettings['errorCheck.'][$key]);
00087                                                         $counter++;
00088                                                 }       
00089                                         }
00090                                 }
00091                                 
00092                                 //set other errorChecks
00093                                 foreach($fieldSettings['errorCheck.'] as $key=>$check) {
00094                                         if(!strstr($key,".")) {
00095                                                 $errorChecks[$counter]['check'] = $check;
00096                                                 if(is_array($fieldSettings['errorCheck.'][$key."."])) {
00097                                                         $errorChecks[$counter]['params'] = $fieldSettings['errorCheck.'][$key."."];
00098                                                 }
00099                                                 $counter++;
00100                                         }
00101                                 }
00102                                 
00103                                 $checkFailed = "";
00104                                 if(!isset($disableErrorCheckFields) || !in_array($name,$disableErrorCheckFields)) {
00105                                         
00106                                         //foreach error checks
00107                                         foreach($errorChecks as $check) {
00108                                                 switch($check['check']) {
00109                                                         
00110                                                         //uploaded file specific
00111                                                         
00112                                                         //file type matches one of the configured allowed types
00113                                                         case "file_allowedTypes":
00114                                                                 $checkFailed = $this->validateAllowedFileTypes($check,$name);
00115                                                         break;
00116                                                         
00117                                                         //only a configured number of files are allowed to be uploaded via this field
00118                                                         case 'file_maxCount':
00119                                                                 $checkFailed = $this->validateMaxFileCount($check,$name);
00120                                                         break;
00121                                                         
00122                                                         //uploaded files must have a minimum size
00123                                                         case "file_minSize":
00124                                                                 $checkFailed = $this->validateMinFileSize($check,$name);
00125                                                         break;
00126                                                         
00127                                                         //uploaded files must have a maximum size
00128                                                         case "file_maxSize":
00129                                                                 $checkFailed = $this->validateMaxFileSize($check,$name);
00130                                                         break;
00131                                                         
00132                                                         //the upload field is required
00133                                                         case "file_required":
00134                                                                 $checkFailed = $this->validateFileRequired($check,$name);
00135                                                         break;
00136                                                         
00137                                                         //value is required
00138                                                         case "required":
00139                                                                 $checkFailed = $this->validateRequired($check,$name);
00140                                                         break;
00141                                                         
00142                                                         //value should be a valid e-mail
00143                                                         case "email":
00144                                                                 $checkFailed = $this->validateEmail($check,$name);
00145                                                         break;
00146                                                         
00147                                                         //the value contains none of the configured words or phrases
00148                                                         case "containsNone":
00149                                                                 $checkFailed = $this->validateContainsNone($check,$name);
00150                                                         break;
00151                                                         
00152                                                         //the value contains at least one of the configured words or phrases
00153                                                         case "containsOne":
00154                                                                 $checkFailed = $this->validateContainsOne($check,$name);
00155                                                         break;
00156                                                         
00157                                                         //the value must contain all of the configured words or phrases
00158                                                         case "containsAll":
00159                                                                 $checkFailed = $this->validateContainsAll($check,$name);
00160                                                         break;
00161                                                         
00162                                                         //the value equals a configured word
00163                                                         case "equals":
00164                                                                 $checkFailed = $this->validateEquals($check,$name);
00165                                                         break;
00166                                                         
00167                                                         //value should not equal it's default value
00168                                                         case "notDefaultValue":
00169                                                                 $checkFailed = $this->validateNotDefaultValue($check,$name);
00170                                                         break;
00171                                                         
00172                                                         //value should be an integer
00173                                                         case "integer":
00174                                                                 $checkFailed = $this->validateInteger($check,$name);
00175                                                         break;
00176                                                         
00177                                                         //value should be a float
00178                                                         case "float":
00179                                                                 $checkFailed = $this->validateFloat($check,$name);
00180                                                         break;
00181                                                         
00182                                                         //value should be greater than X
00183                                                         case "minValue":
00184                                                                 $checkFailed = $this->validateMinValue($check,$name);
00185                                                         break;
00186                                                         
00187                                                         //value should be less than X
00188                                                         case "maxValue":
00189                                                                 $checkFailed = $this->validateMaxValue($check,$name);
00190                                                         break;
00191                                                         
00192                                                         //value should be between X and Y
00193                                                         case "betweenValue":
00194                                                                 $checkFailed = $this->validateBetweenValue($check,$name);
00195                                                         break;
00196                                                         
00197                                                         //value should be a string with a minimum length of X
00198                                                         case "minLength":
00199                                                                 $checkFailed = $this->validateMinLength($check,$name);
00200                                                         break;
00201                                                         
00202                                                         //value should be a string with a maximum length of X
00203                                                         case "maxLength":
00204                                                                 $checkFailed = $this->validateMaxLength($check,$name);
00205                                                         break;
00206                                                         
00207                                                         //value should be a string with a length between X and Y
00208                                                         case "betweenLength":
00209                                                                 $checkFailed = $this->validateBetweenLength($check,$name);
00210                                                         break;
00211                                                         
00212                                                         //value should be a an array with a minimum item count of X
00213                                                         case "minItems":
00214                                                                 $checkFailed = $this->validateMinItems($check,$name);
00215                                                         break;
00216                                                         
00217                                                         //value should be a an array with a maximum item count of X
00218                                                         case "maxItems":
00219                                                                 $checkFailed = $this->validateMaxItems($check,$name);
00220                                                         break;
00221                                                         
00222                                                         //value should be a an array with an item count between X and Y
00223                                                         case "betweenItems":
00224                                                                 $checkFailed = $this->validateBetweenItems($check,$name);
00225                                                         break;
00226                                                         
00227                                                         //value should exist in a db table
00228                                                         case "isInDBTable":
00229                                                                 $checkFailed = $this->validateIsInDBTable($check,$name);
00230                                                         break;
00231                                                         
00232                                                         //value should not exist in a db table
00233                                                         case "isNotInDBTable":
00234                                                                 $checkFailed = $this->validateIsNotInDBTable($check,$name);
00235                                                         break;
00236                                                         
00237                                                         //value should match a regular expression
00238                                                         case "ereg":
00239                                                                 $checkFailed = $this->validateEreg($check,$name);
00240                                                         break;
00241                                                         
00242                                                         //value should match a regular expression (case insensitive)
00243                                                         case "eregi":
00244                                                                 $checkFailed = $this->validateEregi($check,$name);
00245                                                         break;
00246                                                         
00247                                                         //value should match a captcha string generated by the extension 'captcha'
00248                                                         case "captcha":
00249                                                                 $checkFailed = $this->validateCaptcha($check,$name);
00250                                                         break;
00251                                                         
00252                                                         //value should match a captcha string generated by the extension 'sr_freecap'
00253                                                         case "sr_freecap":
00254                                                                 $checkFailed = $this->validateSrFreecap($check,$name);
00255                                                         break;
00256                                                         
00257                                                         //value should match a captcha string generated by the extension 'jm_recaptcha'
00258                                                         case "jm_recaptcha":
00259                                                                 $checkFailed = $this->validateJmRecaptcha($check,$name);
00260                                                         break;
00261                                                         
00262                                                         //value should match the expected result generated by MathGuard
00263                                                         case "mathguard":
00264                                                                 $checkFailed = $this->validateMathGuard($check,$name);
00265                                                         break;
00266                                                         
00267                                                         //the value is between a configured date range
00268                                                         case "dateRange":
00269                                                                 $checkFailed = $this->validateDateRange($check,$name);
00270                                                         break;
00271                                                         
00272                                                         //the value is a valid time
00273                                                         case "time":
00274                                                                 $checkFailed = $this->validateTime($check,$name);
00275                                                         break;
00276                                                         
00277                                                         //the value is a valid date
00278                                                         case "date":
00279                                                                 $checkFailed = $this->validateDate($check,$name);
00280                                                         break;
00281                                                 }
00282                                                 
00283                                                 if(strlen($checkFailed) > 0) {
00284                                                         if(!is_array($errors[$name])) {
00285                                                                 $errors[$name] = array();
00286                                                         }
00287                                                         array_push($errors[$name],$checkFailed);
00288                                                 }
00289                                         }
00290                                 }
00291                         }
00292                 }
00293                 return empty($errors);
00294                 
00295         }
00296         
00305         protected function validateMinFileSize(&$check,$name) {
00306                 $checkFailed = "";
00307                 $minSize = $check['params']['minSize'];
00308                 foreach($_FILES as $sthg=>&$files) {
00309                         if(     strlen($files['name'][$name]) > 0 &&
00310                                 $minSize &&
00311                                 $files['size'][$name] < $minSize) {
00312                 
00313                                 unset($files);
00314                                 $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
00315                         }
00316                 }
00317                 return $checkFailed;
00318         }
00319         
00328         protected function validateMaxFileSize(&$check,$name) {
00329                 $checkFailed = "";
00330                 $maxSize = $check['params']['maxSize'];
00331                 foreach($_FILES as $sthg=>&$files) {
00332                         if(     strlen($files['name'][$name]) > 0 &&
00333                                 $maxSize &&
00334                                 $files['size'][$name] > $maxSize) {
00335                                         
00336                                 unset($files);
00337                                 $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
00338                         }
00339                 }
00340                 return $checkFailed;
00341         }
00342         
00351         protected function validateMaxFileCount(&$check,$name) {
00352                 $checkFailed = "";
00353                 
00354                 session_start();
00355                                                                 
00356                 $maxCount = $check['params']['maxCount'];
00357                 if(     is_array($_SESSION['mailformplusplusFiles'][$name]) && 
00358                         count($_SESSION['mailformplusplusFiles'][$name]) >= $maxCount &&
00359                         $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['currentStep'] == $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['lastStep']) {
00360                         
00361                         $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
00362                 } elseif (is_array($_SESSION['mailformplusplusFiles'][$name]) && 
00363                         $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['currentStep'] > $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['lastStep']) {
00364                         
00365                         foreach($_FILES as $idx=>$info) {
00366                                 if(strlen($info['name'][$name]) > 0 && count($_SESSION['mailformplusplusFiles'][$name]) >= $maxCount) {
00367                                         $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
00368                                 }
00369                         }
00370                         
00371                 }
00372                 return $checkFailed;
00373         }
00374         
00383         protected function validateFileRequired(&$check,$name) {
00384                 $checkFailed = "";
00385                 session_start();
00386                 $found = false;
00387                 foreach($_FILES as $sthg=>&$files) {
00388                         if(strlen($files['name'][$name]) > 0) {
00389                                 $found = true;
00390                         }       
00391                 }
00392                 if(!$found && count($_SESSION['mailformplusplusFiles'][$name]) == 0) {
00393                         $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
00394                 }
00395                 return $checkFailed;
00396         }
00397         
00406         protected function validateRequired(&$check,$name) {
00407                 $checkFailed = "";
00408                 if(strlen(trim($this->gp[$name])) == 0) {
00409                         $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
00410                 }
00411                 return $checkFailed;
00412         }
00413         
00422         protected function validateContainsNone($check,$name) {
00423                 $checkFailed = "";
00424                 $formValue = trim($this->gp[$name]);
00425                 $checkValue = $check['params']['words'];
00426                 if(is_array($check['params']['words.'])) {
00427                         if(!strcmp($check['params']['words'],"USER") || !strcmp($check['params']['words'],"USER_INT")) {
00428                                 $checkValue = t3lib_div::callUserFunction($check['params']['words.']['userFunc'],$check['params']['words.'],$this,"");
00429                         } else {
00430                                 $checkValue = $this->cObj->cObjGetSingle($check['params']['words'],$check['params']['words.']);
00431                         }
00432                 }
00433                 if(!is_array($checkValue)) {
00434                         $checkValue = t3lib_div::trimExplode(",",$checkValue);
00435                 }
00436                 $found = false;
00437                 foreach($checkValue as $word) {
00438                         if(stristr($formValue,$word) && !$found) {
00439                                 
00440                                 //remove userfunc settings and only store comma seperated words
00441                                 $check['params']['words'] = implode(",",$checkValue);
00442                                 unset($check['params']['words.']);
00443                                 $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
00444                                 $found = true;
00445                         }
00446                 }
00447                 return $checkFailed;
00448         }
00449         
00458         protected function validateEquals($check,$name) {
00459                 $checkFailed = "";
00460                 $formValue = trim($this->gp[$name]);
00461                 $checkValue = $check['params']['word'];
00462                 if(is_array($check['params']['word.'])) {
00463                         if(!strcmp($check['params']['word'],"USER") || !strcmp($check['params']['word'],"USER_INT")) {
00464                                 $checkValue = t3lib_div::callUserFunction($check['params']['word.']['userFunc'],$check['params']['word.'],$this,"");
00465                         } else {
00466                                 $checkValue = $this->cObj->cObjGetSingle($check['params']['word'],$check['params']['word.']);
00467                         }
00468                 }
00469                 if(strcasecmp($formValue,$checkValue)) {
00470                         
00471                         //remove userfunc settings
00472                         unset($check['params']['word.']);
00473                         $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
00474                 }
00475                 return $checkFailed;
00476         }
00477         
00486         protected function validateContainsOne($check,$name) {
00487                 $checkFailed = "";
00488                 $formValue = trim($this->gp[$name]);
00489                 $checkValue = $check['params']['words'];
00490                 if(is_array($check['params']['words.'])) {
00491                         if(!strcmp($check['params']['words'],"USER") || !strcmp($check['params']['words'],"USER_INT")) {
00492                                 $checkValue = t3lib_div::callUserFunction($check['params']['words.']['userFunc'],$check['params']['words.'],$this,"");
00493                         } else {
00494                                 $checkValue = $this->cObj->cObjGetSingle($check['params']['words'],$check['params']['words.']);
00495                         }
00496                 }
00497                 if(!is_array($checkValue)) {
00498                         $checkValue = t3lib_div::trimExplode(",",$checkValue);
00499                 }
00500                 $found = false;
00501                 foreach($checkValue as $word) {
00502                         if(stristr($formValue,$word) && !$found) {
00503                                 $found = true;
00504                         }
00505                 }
00506                 if(!$found) {
00507                         
00508                         //remove userfunc settings and only store comma seperated words
00509                         $check['params']['words'] = implode(",",$checkValue);
00510                         unset($check['params']['words.']);
00511                         $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
00512                 }
00513                 return $checkFailed;
00514         }
00515         
00524         protected function validateContainsAll($check,$name) {
00525                 $checkFailed = "";
00526                 $formValue = trim($this->gp[$name]);
00527                 $checkValue = $check['params']['words'];
00528                 if(is_array($check['params']['words.'])) {
00529                         if(!strcmp($check['params']['words'],"USER") || !strcmp($check['params']['words'],"USER_INT")) {
00530                                 $checkValue = t3lib_div::callUserFunction($check['params']['words.']['userFunc'],$check['params']['words.'],$this,"");
00531                         } else {
00532                                 $checkValue = $this->cObj->cObjGetSingle($check['params']['words'],$check['params']['words.']);
00533                         }
00534                 }
00535                 if(!is_array($checkValue)) {
00536                         $checkValue = t3lib_div::trimExplode(",",$checkValue);
00537                 }
00538                 foreach($checkValue as $word) {
00539                         if(!stristr($formValue,$word)) {
00540                                 
00541                                 //remove userfunc settings and only store comma seperated words
00542                                 $check['params']['words'] = implode(",",$checkValue);
00543                                 unset($check['params']['words.']);
00544                                 $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
00545                         }
00546                 }
00547 
00548                 return $checkFailed;
00549         }

00559         protected function validateEmail(&$check,$name) {
00560                 $checkFailed = "";
00561                 $valid = t3lib_div::validEmail($this->gp[$name]);
00562                 if(!$valid) {
00563                         $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
00564                 }
00565                 return $checkFailed;
00566         }
00567         
00577         protected function validateNotDefaultValue(&$check,$name) {
00578                 $checkFailed = "";
00579                 $defaultValue = $check['params']['defaultValue'];
00580                 if(is_array($check['params']['defaultValue.'])) {
00581                         $defaultValue = $this->cObj->cObjGetSingle($check['params']['defaultValue'],$check['params']['defaultValue.']);
00582                 }
00583                 if ($defaultValue != '') {
00584                         if (!strcmp($defaultValue,$this->gp[$name])) {
00585                                 $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
00586                         }
00587                 }
00588                 return $checkFailed;
00589         }
00590         
00599         protected function validateInteger(&$check,$name) {
00600                 $checkFailed = "";
00601                 if(isset($this->gp[$name]) && !empty($this->gp[$name])) {
00602                         $ereg = "^[0-9]+$";
00603                         $valid = ereg($ereg, $this->gp[$name]);
00604                         if(!$valid) {
00605                                 $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
00606                         }
00607                 }
00608                 return $checkFailed;
00609         }
00610         
00619         protected function validateFloat(&$check,$name) {
00620                 $checkFailed = "";
00621                 $valid = is_float($this->gp[$name]);
00622                 if(!$valid) {
00623                         $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
00624                 }
00625                 return $checkFailed;
00626         }

00636         protected function validateMinValue(&$check,$name) {
00637                 $checkFailed = "";
00638                 $min = $check['params']['value'];
00639                 if(     isset($this->gp[$name]) && 
00640                         !empty($this->gp[$name]) &&
00641                         $min &&
00642                         (!t3lib_div::testInt($this->gp[$name]) || intVal($this->gp[$name]) < $min)) {
00643                         
00644                         $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
00645                 }
00646                 return $checkFailed;
00647         }
00648         
00657         protected function validateMaxValue(&$check,$name) {
00658                 $checkFailed = "";
00659                 $max = $check['params']['value'];
00660                 if(     isset($this->gp[$name]) && 
00661                         !empty($this->gp[$name]) &&
00662                         $max &&
00663                         (!t3lib_div::testInt($this->gp[$name]) || intVal($this->gp[$name]) > $max)) {
00664                         
00665                         $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
00666                 }
00667                 return $checkFailed;
00668         }

00678         protected function validateBetweenValue(&$check,$name) {
00679                 $checkFailed = "";
00680                 $min = $check['params']['minValue'];
00681                 $max = $check['params']['maxValue'];
00682                 if(     isset($this->gp[$name]) && 
00683                         !empty($this->gp[$name]) &&
00684                         $min &&
00685                         $max &&
00686                         (!t3lib_div::testInt($this->gp[$name]) || intVal($this->gp[$name]) < $min || intVal($this->gp[$name]) > $max)) {
00687                         
00688                         $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
00689                 }
00690                 return $checkFailed;
00691         }

00750                         $min &&
00751                         $max &&

00767         protected function validateMinItems(&$check,$name) {
00768                 $checkFailed = "";
00769                 $value = $check['params']['value'];
00770                 if(is_array($this->gp[$name])) {
00771                         if(count($this->gp[$name]) < $value) {
00772                                 $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
00773                         }
00774                 } else {
00775                         $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
00776                 }
00777                 return $checkFailed;
00778         }
00779         
00788         protected function validateMaxItems(&$check,$name) {
00789                 $checkFailed = "";
00790                 $value = $check['params']['value'];
00791                 if(is_array($this->gp[$name])) {
00792                         if(count($this->gp[$name]) > $value) {
00793                                 $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
00794                         }
00795                 } else {
00796                         $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
00797                 }
00798         }

00808         protected function validateBetweenItems(&$check,$name) {
00809                 $checkFailed = "";
00810                 $min = $check['params']['minValue'];
00811                 $max = $check['params']['maxValue'];
00812                 if(     isset($this->gp[$name]) && 
00813                         !empty($this->gp[$name]) && 
00814                         is_array($this->gp[$name]) &&
00815                         $min &&
00816                         $max &&
00817                         (count($this->gp[$name]) < $min || count($this->gp[$name]) > $max)) {
00818 
00819                         $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
00820                 }
00821                 return $checkFailed;
00822         }

00832         protected function validateIsInDBTable(&$check,$name) {
00833                 $checkFailed = "";
00834                 $checkTable = $check['params']['table'];
00835                 $checkField = $check['params']['field'];
00836                 $where = $check['params']['additionalWhere'];
00837                 if (!empty($checkTable) && !empty($checkField)) {
00838                         $where = $checkField.'='.$GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->fullQuoteStr($this->get_post[$fieldname],$checkTable).' '.$additionalWhere;
00839                         $res = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->exec_SELECTquery($checkField,$checkTable,$where);
00840                         if ($res && !$GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_num_rows($res)) {
00841                                 $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
00842                         }
00843                         $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_free_result($res);
00844                 }
00845                 return $checkFailed;
00846         }

00861                 if (!empty($checkTable) && !empty($checkField)) {

00863                         $res = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->exec_SELECTquery($checkField,$checkTable,$where);
00864                         if ($res && $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_num_rows($res) > 0) {
00865                                 $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
00866                         }
00867                         $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_free_result($res);
00868                 }

00870                 return $checkFailed;

00994         protected function validateTime(&$check,$name) {
00995                 $checkFailed = "";
00996                 $pattern = $check['params']['pattern'];
00997                 eregi('^[h|m]*(.)[h|m]*', $pattern, $res);
00998                 $sep = $res[1];                     
00999                 $timeCheck = explode($sep, $this->get_post[$fieldname]);
01000                 if (is_array($timeCheck)) {
01001                         $hours = $tc[0];
01002                         if (!is_numeric($hours) || $hours < 0 || $hours > 23) {
01003                                 $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
01004                         }
01005                         $minutes = $tc[1];
01006                         if (!is_numeric($minutes) || $minutes < 0 || $minutes > 59) {
01007                                 $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
01008                         }
01009                 }
01010                 return $checkFailed;

01021         protected function validateAllowedFileTypes(&$check,$name) {
01022                 $checkFailed = "";
01023                 $allowed = $check['params']['allowedTypes'];
01024                 foreach($_FILES as $sthg=>&$files) {
01025                         if(strlen($files['name'][$name]) > 0) {
01026                                 if($allowed) {
01027                                         $types = t3lib_div::trimExplode(",",$allowed);
01028                                         $fileext = substr($files['name'][$name], strrpos($files['name'][$name], '.') + 1);
01029                                         if(!in_array($fileext,$types)) {
01030                                                 unset($files);
01031                                                 $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
01032                                         }               
01033                                 }
01034                         }
01035                 }
01036                 return $checkFailed;
01037         }

01047         protected function validateDate(&$check,$name) {
01048                 $checkFailed = "";
01049                 
01050                 # find out separator
01051                 $pattern = $check['params']['pattern'];
01052                 eregi('^[d|m|y]*(.)[d|m|y]*', $pattern, $res);
01053                 $sep = $res[1];
01054                 
01055                 # normalisation of format
01056                 $pattern = $this->normalizeDatePattern($pattern,$sep);
01057                 
01058                 # find out correct positioins of "d","m","y"
01059                 $pos1 = strpos($pattern, 'd');
01060                 $pos2 = strpos($pattern, 'm');
01061                 $pos3 = strpos($pattern, 'y');
01062                 $dateCheck = explode($sep, $this->gp[$name]);
01063                 if (sizeof($dateCheck) != 3) {
01064                         $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
01065                 } elseif (intval($dateCheck[0]) == 0 || intval($dateCheck[1]) == 0 || intval($dateCheck[2]) == 0) {
01066                         $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
01067                 } elseif (!checkdate($dateCheck[$pos2], $dateCheck[$pos1], $dateCheck[$pos3])) {
01068                         $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
01069                 } elseif (strlen($dateCheck[$pos3]) != 4) {
01070                         $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
01071                 }
01072                 return $checkFailed;
01073         }
01074         
01083         protected function validateDateRange(&$check,$name) {
01084                 
01085                 $checkFailed = "";
01086                 
01087                 $min = $check['params']['min'];
01088                 $max = $check['params']['max'];
01089                 $pattern = $check['params']['pattern'];
01090                 eregi('^[d|m|y]*(.)[d|m|y]*', $pattern, $res);
01091                 $sep = $res[1];
01092                 
01093                 # normalisation of format
01094                 $pattern = $this->normalizeDatePattern($pattern,$sep);
01095                 
01096                 # find out correct positioins of "d","m","y"
01097                 $pos1 = strpos($pattern, 'd');
01098                 $pos2 = strpos($pattern, 'm');
01099                 $pos3 = strpos($pattern, 'y');
01100                 $date = $this->gp[$name];
01101                 $checkdate = explode($sep,$date);
01102                 $check_day = $checkdate[$pos1];
01103                 $check_month = $checkdate[$pos2];
01104                 $check_year = $checkdate[$pos3];
01105                 if($min != "") {
01106                         $min_date = explode($sep,$min);
01107                         $min_day = $min_date[$pos1];
01108                         $min_month = $min_date[$pos2];
01109                         $min_year = $min_date[$pos3];
01110                         if($check_year<$min_year) {
01111                                 $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
01112                         } elseif ($check_year == $min_year && $check_month < $min_month) {
01113                                 $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
01114                         } elseif ($check_year == $min_year && $check_month == $min_month && $check_day < $min_day) {
01115                                 $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
01116                         }
01117                 }
01118                 if($max != "") {
01119                         $max_date = explode($sep,$max);
01120                         $max_day = $max_date[$pos1];
01121                         $max_month = $max_date[$pos2];
01122                         $max_year = $max_date[$pos3];
01123                         if($check_year > $max_year) {
01124                                 $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
01125                         } elseif ($check_year == $max_year && $check_month > $max_month) {
01126                                 $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
01127                         } elseif ($check_year == $max_year && $check_month == $max_month && $check_day > $max_day) {
01128                                 $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
01129                         }
01130                 }
01131                 
01132                 return $checkFailed;
01133         }
01134         
01143         protected function normalizeDatePattern($pattern,$sep) {
01144                 $pattern = strtoupper($pattern);
01145                 $pattern = str_replace($sep, '', $pattern);
01146                 $pattern = str_replace('DD', 'd', $pattern);
01147                 $pattern = str_replace('D', 'd', $pattern);
01148                 $pattern = str_replace('MM', 'm', $pattern);
01149                 $pattern = str_replace('M', 'm', $pattern);
01150                 $pattern = str_replace('YYYY', 'y', $pattern);
01151                 $pattern = str_replace('YY', 'y', $pattern);
01152                 return $pattern;
01153         }
01154         
01162         protected function getCheckFailed($check) {
01163                 $checkFailed = $check['check'];
01164                 if(is_array($check['params'])) {
01165                         $checkFailed .= ";";
01166                         foreach($check['params'] as $key=>$value) {
01167                                 $checkFailed .= $key."::".$value.";";
01168                         }
01169                         $checkFailed = substr($checkFailed,0,strlen($checkFailed)-1);
01170                 }
01171                 return $checkFailed;
01172         }
